name: Paper Mario Battle Creator 2
description:
>>>>>>>READ INSTRUCTIONS<<<<<<<<

Editor Controls:

-Use the sliders to set Mario's and the enemy's stats

-Click the enemy, background and music button to change them

-Click "Finish And Play!" to play your battle!

-Remix to save and share your battle!

Battle Controls:

-Select which attack you'd like to use

-When jumping, press the up arrow right before landing to deal extra damage!

-When using the hammer, press and hold the left arrow until the red circle lights up, then release it to deal more damage!

-When the enemy is attacking, press the down arrow right before the enemy attacks to reduce the amount of damage taken.

Welcome to the Paper Mario Battle Creator 2! Create and customize your own Paper Mario battle! This is a sequel to an older project of mine made back in 2016. Looking back at it, it wasn't very accurate to Paper Mario's battle engine and had a lot of glitches. This time it has minimal glitches and much more involved and polished gameplay.

Credits:

-Sprites from mariouniverse.com

-Sounds from the Sounds Resource and project PMO

-Some sprites by me

-Music from Nintendo and Intelligent Systems

-Mario by Nintendo

-All coding by me
